column4: Anyone help me get my monitor to display the correct settings?
I can try, what do you need?
Im stuck at 1024*768 where my monitor goes to 1440*900
try running sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
change the settings in there if you need to
thats probably one of the easiest ways.
sweet :)
nada
? after you did that did you try restarting your X server? (ctrl+alt+backspace)
you could always try actually editing the xserver file, I'm not too familiar with it though
I gave you IIRC? lol I don't know what that is... have you tried directly editing the xorg.conf file?
IIRC = If I Remember Correctly
try editing /etc/X11/xorg.conf
I'm not very familiar with that file though
got the resolution changed, but now I have no menu bar to minimize maximize and close the windows, much less move them around the desktop
thats weird, how did you get the resolution changed?
hmmm I'm not sure what to do... That happens to me if I try to use compiz..
did you backup your xorg first?
if not, check the file for an older xorg file, mine auto-backed up a bunch when i was working on it
yes, but I dont know how I could get it back...I have no CLI that I can use
try restarting into recovery mode
